dcterms:creator: L. Gabora
P. Colgan
dcterms:description: A study comparing exploratory behavior of killifish from two lakes, one with predators and one without, showing that both groups explore equally but those from the predator lake take longer.
dcterms:title: Killifish from two lakes (one with predators and one without)

dcterms:creator: S. Riley
L. Gabora
dcterms:description: A creativity study where participants wrote stories based on photographs rated for threat level, finding that threatening images led to more creative outputs.
dcterms:title: Photographs used in the creativity study
